   16: 
   17: -module(syntax_tools_SUITE).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   20: 
   21: %% Test server specific exports
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: %% Test cases
   26: -export([app_test/1,appup_test/1,smoke_test/1,revert/1,revert_map/1,
   27:          revert_map_type/1,revert_preserve_pos_changes/1,
   28:          wrapped_subtrees/1,
   29:          t_abstract_type/1,t_erl_parse_type/1,t_type/1,
   30:          t_epp_dodger/1,t_epp_dodger_clever/1,
   31:          t_comment_scan/1,t_prettypr/1,test_named_fun_bind_ann/1,
   32:          test_maybe_match_expr_ann/1]).
   33: 
   34: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   35: 
   36: all() ->
   37:     [app_test,appup_test,smoke_test,revert,revert_map,revert_map_type,
   38:      revert_preserve_pos_changes,
   39:      wrapped_subtrees,
   40:      t_abstract_type,t_erl_parse_type,t_type,
   41:      t_epp_dodger,t_epp_dodger_clever,
   42:      t_comment_scan,t_prettypr,test_named_fun_bind_ann].
   43: 
   44: groups() ->
   45:     [].
   46: 
   47: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   51:     ok.
   52: 
   53: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: app_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   60:     ok = test_server:app_test(syntax_tools).
   61: 
   62: appup_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   63:     ok = test_server:appup_test(syntax_tools).
   64: 
   65: %% Read and parse all source in the OTP release.
   66: smoke_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   67:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(12)),
   68:     Wc = filename:join([code:lib_dir(),"*","src","*.erl"]),
   69:     Fs = filelib:wildcard(Wc) ++ test_files(Config),
   70:     io:format("~p files\n", [length(Fs)]),
   71:     case p_run(fun smoke_test_file/1, Fs) of
   72:         0 -> ok;
   73:         N -> ct:fail({N,errors})
   74:     end,
   75:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
   76: 
   77: smoke_test_file(File) ->
   78:     case epp_dodger:parse_file(File) of
   79: 	{ok,Forms} ->
   80: 	    [print_error_markers(F, File) || F <- Forms],
   81: 	    ok;
   82: 	{error,Reason} ->
   83: 	    io:format("~ts: ~p\n", [File,Reason]),
   84: 	    error
   85:     end.
   86: 
   87: print_error_markers(F, File) ->
   88:     case erl_syntax:type(F) of
   89: 	error_marker ->
   90: 	    {L,M,Info} = erl_syntax:error_marker_info(F),
   91: 	    io:format("~ts:~p: ~ts", [File,L,M:format_error(Info)]);
   92: 	_ ->
   93: 	    ok
   94:     end.
   95: 
   96: 
   97: %% Read with erl_parse, wrap and revert with erl_syntax and check for equality.
   98: revert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   99:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(12)),
  100:     Wc = filename:join([code:lib_dir("stdlib"),"src","*.erl"]),
  101:     Fs = filelib:wildcard(Wc) ++ test_files(Config),
  102:     Path = [filename:join(code:lib_dir(stdlib), "include"),
  103:             filename:join(code:lib_dir(kernel), "include")],
  104:     io:format("~p files\n", [length(Fs)]),
  105:     case p_run(fun (File) -> revert_file(File, Path) end, Fs) of
  106:         0 -> ok;
  107:         N -> ct:fail({N,errors})
  108:         end,
  109:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  110: 
  111: revert_file(File, Path) ->
  112:     case epp:parse_file(File, [{includes,Path},
  113:                                res_word_option()]) of
  114:         {ok,Fs0} ->
  115:             Fs1 = erl_syntax:form_list(Fs0),
  116:             Fs2 = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun (Node) -> Node end, Fs1),
  117:             Fs3 = erl_syntax:form_list_elements(Fs2),
  118:             Fs4 = [ erl_syntax:revert(Form) || Form <- Fs3 ],
  119:             case compile:forms(Fs4, [report,return,strong_validation]) of
  120:                 {ok,_,_} -> ok;
  121:                 {error, [{_, [{_, epp, {moduledoc, file, _}}]}],[]} ->
  122:                     ok;
  123:                 {error, [{_, [{_, epp, {doc, file, _}}]}],[]} ->
  124:                     ok
  125:             end
  126:     end.
  127: 
  128: %% Testing bug fix for reverting map_field_assoc
  129: revert_map(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  130:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(1)),
  131:     [{map_field_assoc,16,{atom,17,name},{var,18,'Value'}}] =
  132:     erl_syntax:revert_forms([{tree,map_field_assoc,
  133:                              {attr,16,[],none},
  134: 			     {map_field_assoc,{atom,17,name},{var,18,'Value'}}}]),
  135:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  136: 
  137: %% Testing bug fix for reverting map_field_assoc in types
  138: revert_map_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  139:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(1)),
  140:     Form1 = {attribute,4,record,
  141:              {state,
  142:               [{typed_record_field,
  143:                 {record_field,5,{atom,5,x}},
  144:                 {type,5,map,
  145:                  [{type,5,map_field_exact,[{atom,5,y},{atom,5,z}]}]}}]}},
  146:     Mapped1 = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(X) -> X end, Form1),
  147:     Form1 = erl_syntax:revert(Mapped1),
  148:     Form2 = {attribute,4,record,
  149:              {state,
  150:               [{typed_record_field,
  151:                 {record_field,5,{atom,5,x}},
  152:                 {type,5,map,
  153:                  [{type,5,map_field_assoc,[{atom,5,y},{atom,5,z}]}]}}]}},
  154:     Mapped2 = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(X) -> X end, Form2),
  155:     Form2 = erl_syntax:revert(Mapped2),
  156:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  157: 
  158: revert_preserve_pos_changes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  159:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(1)),
  160:     Pos0 = 1,
  161:     Var0 = {var, Pos0, 'Var'},
  162:     %% Adding any user annotation makes erl_syntax change to it's internal
  163:     %% representation
  164:     Var1 = erl_syntax:add_ann({env, []}, Var0),
  165:     %% Change the `pos' of the node
  166:     Pos1 = erl_anno:set_generated(true, Pos0),
  167:     Var2 = erl_syntax:set_pos(Var1, Pos1),
  168:     %% The must be equal when reverted
  169:     {var, Pos1, 'Var'} = erl_syntax:revert(Var2),
  170:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  171: 
  172: %% Read with erl_parse, wrap each tree node with erl_syntax and check that
  173: %% erl_syntax:subtrees can access the wrapped node.
  174: wrapped_subtrees(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  175:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(2)),
  176:     Wc = filename:join([code:lib_dir(stdlib),"src","*.erl"]),
  177:     Fs = filelib:wildcard(Wc) ++ test_files(Config),
  178:     Path = [filename:join(code:lib_dir(stdlib), "include"),
  179:             filename:join(code:lib_dir(kernel), "include")],
  180:     io:format("~p files\n", [length(Fs)]),
  181:     Map = fun (File) -> wrapped_subtrees_file(File, Path) end,
  182:     case p_run(Map, Fs) of
  183:         0 -> ok;
  184:         N -> ct:fail({N,errors})
  185:     end,
  186:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  187: 
  188: wrapped_subtrees_file(File, Path) ->
  189:     case epp:parse_file(File, Path, []) of
  190:         {ok,Fs0} ->
  191:             lists:foreach(fun wrap_each/1, Fs0)
  192:     end.
  193: 
  194: wrap_each(Tree) ->
  195:     % only `wrap` top-level erl_parse node
  196:     Tree1 = erl_syntax:set_pos(Tree, erl_syntax:get_pos(Tree)),
  197:     % assert ability to access subtrees of wrapped node with erl_syntax:subtrees/1
  198:     case erl_syntax:subtrees(Tree1) of
  199:         [] -> ok;
  200:         List ->
  201:             GrpsF = fun(Group) ->
  202:                           lists:foreach(fun wrap_each/1, Group)
  203:                     end,
  204:             lists:foreach(GrpsF, List)
  205:     end.
  206: 
  207: %% api tests
  208: 
  209: t_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  210:     F0 = fun validate_basic_type/1,
  211:     Appl0 = fun(Name) ->
  212:                     Atom = erl_syntax:atom(Name),
  213:                     erl_syntax:type_application(none, Atom, [])
  214:             end,
  215:     User0 = fun(Name) ->
  216:                     Atom = erl_syntax:atom(Name),
  217:                     erl_syntax:user_type_application(Atom, [])
  218:             end,
  219:     ok = validate(F0,[{"tuple()", erl_syntax:tuple_type()}
  220:                      ,{"{}", erl_syntax:tuple_type([])}
  221:                      ,{"integer()", Appl0(integer)}
  222:                      ,{"foo()", User0(foo)}
  223:                      ,{"map()", erl_syntax:map_type()}
  224:                      ,{"#{}", erl_syntax:map_type([])}
  225:                      ,{"1..2", erl_syntax:integer_range_type
  226:                           (erl_syntax:integer(1), erl_syntax:integer(2))}
  227:                      ,{"<<_:1,_:_*2>>", erl_syntax:bitstring_type
  228:                           (erl_syntax:integer(1), erl_syntax:integer(2))}
  229:                      ,{"fun()", erl_syntax:fun_type()}
  230:                      ]),
  231: 
  232:     F = fun validate_type/1,
  233:     ok = validate(F,[{"{}", tuple_type, false}
  234:                     ,{"tuple()", tuple_type, true}
  235:                     ,{"{atom()}", tuple_type, false}
  236:                     ,{"{atom(),integer()}", tuple_type, false}
  237:                     ,{"integer()", type_application, false}
  238:                     ,{"foo()", user_type_application, false}
  239:                     ,{"foo(integer())", user_type_application, false}
  240:                     ,{"module:function()", type_application, false}
  241:                     ,{"map()", map_type, true}
  242:                     ,{"#{}", map_type, false}
  243:                     ,{"#{atom() => integer()}", map_type, false}
  244:                     ,{"#{atom() := integer()}", map_type, false}
  245:                     ,{"#r{}", record_type, false}
  246:                     ,{"#r{a :: integer()}", record_type, false}
  247:                     ,{"[]", type_application, false}
  248:                     ,{"nil()", type_application, false}
  249:                     ,{"[atom()]", type_application, false}
  250:                     ,{"1..2", integer_range_type, false}
  251:                     ,{"<<_:1,_:_*2>>", bitstring_type, false}
  252:                     ,{"fun()", fun_type, true}
  253:                     ,{"integer() | atom()", type_union, false}
  254:                     ,{"A :: fun()", annotated_type, false}
  255:                     ,{"fun((...) -> atom())", function_type, false}
  256:                     ,{"fun((integer()) -> atom())", function_type, false}
  257:                     ,{"V", variable, true}
  258:                     ]),
  259:     ok.
  260: 
  261: validate_basic_type({String, Tree}) ->
  262:     ErlT = string_to_type(String),
  263:     ErlT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  264:     ok.
  265: 
  266: validate_type({String, Type, Leaf}) ->
  267:     ErlT = string_to_type(String),
  268:     Type = erl_syntax:type(ErlT),
  269:     Leaf = erl_syntax:is_leaf(ErlT),
  270:     Tree = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(Node) -> Node end, ErlT),
  271:     Type = erl_syntax:type(Tree),
  272:     _    = erl_syntax:meta(Tree),
  273:     RevT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  274:     Type = erl_syntax:type(RevT),
  275:     ok.
  276: 
  277: t_abstract_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  278:     F = fun validate_abstract_type/1,
  279:     ok = validate(F,[{hi,atom},
  280: 		     {1,integer},
  281: 		     {1.0,float},
  282: 		     {$a,integer},
  283: 		     {[],nil},
  284: 		     {[<<1,2>>,a,b],list},
  285: 		     {[2,3,<<1,2>>,a,b],list},
  286: 		     {[$a,$b,$c],string},
  287: 		     {"hello world",string},
  288: 		     {<<1,2,3>>,binary},
  289:                      {<<1,2,3:4>>,binary},
  290: 		     {#{a=>1,"b"=>2},map_expr},
  291: 		     {#{#{i=>1}=>1,"b"=>#{v=>2}},map_expr},
  292: 		     {{a,b,c},tuple}]),
  293:     ok.
  294: 
  295: t_erl_parse_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  296:     F = fun validate_erl_parse_type/1,
  297:     %% leaf types
  298:     ok = validate(F,[{"1",integer,true},
  299: 		     {"123456789",integer,true},
  300: 		     {"$h", char,true},
  301: 		     {"3.1415", float,true},
  302: 		     {"1.33e36", float,true},
  303: 		     {"\"1.33e36: hello\"", string,true},
  304: 		     {"Var1", variable,true},
  305: 		     {"_", underscore,true},
  306: 		     {"[]", nil,true},
  307: 		     {"{}", tuple,true},
  308: 		     {"#{}",map_expr,true},
  309: 		     {"'some atom'", atom, true}]),
  310:     %% composite types
  311:     ok = validate(F,[{"case X of t -> t; f -> f end", case_expr,false},
  312: 		     {"try X of t -> t catch C:R -> error end", try_expr,false},
  313: 		     {"receive X -> X end", receive_expr,false},
  314: 		     {"receive M -> X1 after T -> X2 end", receive_expr,false},
  315: 		     {"catch (X)", catch_expr,false},
  316: 		     {"fun(X) -> X end", fun_expr,false},
  317: 		     {"fun Foo(X) -> X end", named_fun_expr,false},
  318: 		     {"fun foo/2", implicit_fun,false},
  319: 		     {"fun bar:foo/2", implicit_fun,false},
  320: 		     {"if X -> t; true -> f end", if_expr,false},
  321: 		     {"<<1,2,3,4>>", binary,false},
  322: 		     {"<<1,2,3,4:5>>", binary,false},
  323: 		     {"<<V1:63,V2:22/binary, V3/bits>>", binary,false},
  324: 		     {"begin X end", block_expr,false},
  325: 		     {"foo(X1,X2)", application,false},
  326: 		     {"bar:foo(X1,X2)", application,false},
  327: 		     {"[1,2,3,4]", list,false},
  328: 		     {"[1|4]", list, false},
  329: 		     {"[<<1>>,<<2>>,-2,<<>>,[more,list]]", list,false},
  330: 		     {"[1|[2|[3|[4|[]]]]]", list,false},
  331: 		     {"#{ a=>1, b=>2 }", map_expr,false},
  332: 		     {"#{3=>3}#{ a=>1, b=>2 }", map_expr,false},
  333: 		     {"#{ a:=1, b:=2 }", map_expr,false},
  334: 		     {"M#{ a=>1, b=>2 }", map_expr,false},
  335: 		     {"[V||V <- Vs]", list_comp,false},
  336: 		     {"[V||V <:- Vs]", list_comp,false},
  337: 		     {"[catch V||V <- Vs]", list_comp,false},
  338: 		     {"<< <<B>> || <<B>> <= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  339: 		     {"<< <<B>> || <<B>> <:= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  340: 		     {"<< (catch <<B>>) || <<B>> <= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  341: 		     {"#{K => V || {K,V} <- KVs}", map_comp,false},
  342: 		     {"#{K => V || {K,V} <:- KVs}", map_comp,false},
  343: 		     {"#{K => (catch V) || {K,V} <- KVs}", map_comp,false},
  344:                      {"[V+W||V <- Vs && W <- Ws]", list_comp,false},
  345:                      {"[catch V+W||V <- Vs && W <- Ws]", list_comp,false},
  346:                      {"<< <<B>> || <<B>> <= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  347:                      {"<< (catch <<B>>) || <<B>> <= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  348:                      {"<< <<B:8,C:8>> || <<B>> <= Bs && <<C>> <= Cs>>", binary_comp,false},
  349: 		     {"<< (catch <<B:8,C:8>>) || <<B>> <= Bs && <<C>> <= Cs>>", binary_comp,false},
  350: 		     {"#state{ a = A, b = B}", record_expr,false},
  351: 		     {"#state{}", record_expr,false},
  352: 		     {"#s{ a = #def{ a=A }, b = B}", record_expr,false},
  353: 		     {"State#state{ a = A, b = B}", record_expr,false},
  354: 		     {"State#state.a", record_access,false},
  355: 		     {"#state.a", record_index_expr,false},
  356: 		     {"-X", prefix_expr,false},
  357: 		     {"X1 + X2", infix_expr,false},
  358: 		     {"(X1 + X2) * X3", infix_expr,false},
  359: 		     {"X1 = X2", match_expr,false},
  360: 		     {"{a,b,c}", tuple,false}]),
  361:     ok.
  362: 
  363: %% the macro ?MODULE seems faulty
  364: t_epp_dodger(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  365:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  366:     PrivDir   = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  367:     Filenames = test_files(),
  368:     ok = test_epp_dodger(Filenames,DataDir,PrivDir),
  369:     ok.
  370: 
  371: t_epp_dodger_clever(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  372:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  373:     PrivDir   = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  374:     Filenames = ["epp_dodger_clever.erl"],
  375:     ok = test_epp_dodger_clever(Filenames,DataDir,PrivDir),
  376:     ok.
  377: 
  378: t_comment_scan(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  379:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  380:     Filenames = test_files(),
  381:     ok = test_comment_scan(Filenames,DataDir),
  382:     ok.
  383: 
  384: t_prettypr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  385:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  386:     PrivDir   = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  387:     Filenames = test_files(),
  388:     ok = test_prettypr(Filenames,DataDir,PrivDir),
  389:     ok.
  390: 
  391: %% Test bug (#4733) fix for annotating bindings for named fun expressions
  392: test_named_fun_bind_ann(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  393:     Fn = {named_fun,{6,5},
  394:             'F',
  395:             [{clause,{6,9},
  396:                 [{var,{6,11},'Test'}],
  397:                 [],
  398:                 [{var,{7,13},'Test'}]}]},
  399:     AnnT = erl_syntax_lib:annotate_bindings(Fn, []),
  400:     [Env, Bound, Free] = erl_syntax:get_ann(AnnT),
  401:     {'env',[]} = Env,
  402:     {'bound',[]} = Bound,
  403:     {'free',[]} = Free,
  404: 
  405:     NameVar = erl_syntax:named_fun_expr_name(AnnT),
  406:     Name = erl_syntax:variable_name(NameVar),
  407:     [NEnv, NBound, NFree] = erl_syntax:get_ann(NameVar),
  408:     {'env',[]} = NEnv,
  409:     {'bound',[Name]} = NBound,
  410:     {'free',[]} = NFree,
  411: 
  412:     [Clause] = erl_syntax:named_fun_expr_clauses(AnnT),
  413:     [CEnv, CBound, CFree] = erl_syntax:get_ann(Clause),
  414:     {'env',[Name]} = CEnv,
  415:     {'bound',['Test']} = CBound,
  416:     {'free', []} = CFree.
  417: 
  418: test_maybe_match_expr_ann(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  419:     MaybeMatch = erl_syntax:maybe_match_expr(
  420:                     erl_syntax:atom(ok),
  421:                     erl_syntax:variable('Test')),
  422:     Maybe = erl_syntax:maybe_expr([MaybeMatch]),
  423:     AnnT = erl_syntax_lib:annotate_bindings(Maybe, []),
  424:     [Env, Bound, Free] = erl_syntax:get_ann(AnnT),
  425:     {'env',[]} = Env,
  426:     {'bound',[]} = Bound,
  427:     {'free',[]} = Free.
  428: 
  429: test_files(Config) ->
  430:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  431:     [ filename:join(DataDir,Filename) || Filename <- test_files() ].
  432: 
  433: test_files() ->
  434:     ["syntax_tools_SUITE_test_module.erl",
  435:      "syntax_tools_test.erl",
  436:      "type_specs.erl",
  437:      "specs_and_funs.erl"].
  438: 
  439: test_comment_scan([],_) -> ok;
  440: test_comment_scan([File|Files],DataDir) ->
  441:     Filename  = filename:join(DataDir,File),
  442:     {ok, Fs0} = epp:parse_file(Filename, [], []),
  443:     Comments  = erl_comment_scan:file(Filename),
  444:     Fun = fun(Node) ->
  445: 		  case erl_syntax:is_form(Node) of
  446: 		      true ->
  447: 			  C1    = erl_syntax:comment(2,[" This is a form."]),
  448: 			  Node1 = erl_syntax:add_precomments([C1],Node),
  449: 			  Node1;
  450: 		      false ->
  451: 			  Node
  452: 		  end
  453: 	  end,
  454:     Fs1 = erl_recomment:recomment_forms(Fs0, Comments),
  455:     Fs2 = erl_syntax_lib:map(Fun, Fs1),
  456:     io:format("File: ~ts~n", [Filename]),
  457:     io:put_chars(erl_prettypr:format(Fs2, [{paper,  120},
  458: 					   {ribbon, 110}])),
  459:     test_comment_scan(Files,DataDir).
  460: 
  461: 
  462: test_prettypr([],_,_) -> ok;
  463: test_prettypr([File|Files],DataDir,PrivDir) ->
  464:     Filename  = filename:join(DataDir,File),
  465:     Options = [res_word_option()],
  466:     io:format("Parsing ~p~n", [Filename]),
  467:     {ok, Fs0} = epp:parse_file(Filename, Options),
  468:     Fs = erl_syntax:form_list(Fs0),
  469:     PP = erl_prettypr:format(Fs, [{paper,  120}, {ribbon, 110}]),
  470:     io:put_chars(PP),
  471:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir, File),
  472:     ok = file:write_file(OutFile,unicode:characters_to_binary(PP)),
  473:     io:format("Parsing OutFile: ~ts~n", [OutFile]),
  474:     {ok, Fs2} = epp:parse_file(OutFile, Options),
  475:     case [Error || {error, _} = Error <- Fs2] of
  476:         [] ->
  477:             ok;
  478:         Errors ->
  479:             ct:fail(Errors)
  480:     end,
  481:     test_prettypr(Files,DataDir,PrivDir).
  482: 
  483: test_epp_dodger([], _, _) -> ok;
  484: test_epp_dodger([Filename|Files],DataDir,PrivDir) ->
  485:     io:format("Parsing ~p~n", [Filename]),
  486:     Options  = [{feature, maybe_expr, enable}],
  487:     InFile   = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
  488:     Parsers  = [{fun(File) -> epp_dodger:parse_file(File, Options) end,parse_file},
  489: 		{fun(File) -> epp_dodger:quick_parse_file(File,
  490:                                                           Options) end,quick_parse_file},
  491: 		{fun (File) ->
  492: 			{ok,Dev} = file:open(File,[read]),
  493: 			Res = epp_dodger:parse(Dev, Options),
  494: 			file:close(File),
  495: 			Res
  496: 		 end, parse},
  497: 		{fun (File) ->
  498: 			{ok,Dev} = file:open(File,[read]),
  499: 			Res = epp_dodger:quick_parse(Dev, Options),
  500: 			file:close(File),
  501: 			Res
  502: 		 end, quick_parse}],
  503:     FsForms  = parse_with(Parsers, InFile),
  504:     ok = pretty_print_parse_forms(FsForms,PrivDir,Filename),
  505:     test_epp_dodger(Files,DataDir,PrivDir).
  506: 
  507: test_epp_dodger_clever([], _, _) -> ok;
  508: test_epp_dodger_clever([Filename|Files],DataDir,PrivDir) ->
  509:     io:format("Parsing ~p~n", [Filename]),
  510:     InFile   = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
  511:     Parsers  = [{fun(File) ->
  512:                          epp_dodger:parse_file(File, [clever])
  513:                  end, parse_file},
  514: 		{fun(File) ->
  515:                          epp_dodger:quick_parse_file(File, [clever])
  516:                  end, quick_parse_file}],
  517:     FsForms  = parse_with(Parsers, InFile),
  518:     ok = pretty_print_parse_forms(FsForms,PrivDir,Filename),
  519:     test_epp_dodger_clever(Files,DataDir,PrivDir).
  520: 
  521: parse_with([],_) -> [];
  522: parse_with([{Fun,ParserType}|Funs],File) ->
  523:     {ok, Fs} = Fun(File),
  524:     ErrorMarkers = [begin
  525:                         print_error_markers(F, File),
  526:                         F
  527:                     end
  528:                     || F <- Fs,
  529:                        erl_syntax:type(F) =:= error_marker],
  530:     [] = ErrorMarkers,
  531:     [{Fs,ParserType}|parse_with(Funs,File)].
  532: 
  533: pretty_print_parse_forms([],_,_) -> ok;
  534: pretty_print_parse_forms([{Fs0,Type}|FsForms],PrivDir,Filename) ->
  535:     Parser  = atom_to_list(Type),
  536:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir, Parser ++"_" ++ Filename),
  537:     io:format("Pretty print ~p (~w) to ~p~n", [Filename,Type,OutFile]),
  538:     Comment = fun (Node,{CntCase,CntTry}=Cnt) ->
  539: 		      case erl_syntax:type(Node) of
  540: 			  case_expr ->
  541: 			      C1    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["Before a case expression"]),
  542: 			      Node1 = erl_syntax:add_precomments([C1],Node),
  543: 			      C2    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["After a case expression"]),
  544: 			      Node2 = erl_syntax:add_postcomments([C2],Node1),
  545: 			      {Node2,{CntCase+1,CntTry}};
  546: 			  try_expr ->
  547: 			      C1    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["Before a try expression"]),
  548: 			      Node1 = erl_syntax:set_precomments(Node,
  549: 						     erl_syntax:get_precomments(Node) ++ [C1]),
  550: 			      C2    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["After a try expression"]),
  551: 			      Node2 = erl_syntax:set_postcomments(Node1,
  552: 						     erl_syntax:get_postcomments(Node1) ++ [C2]),
  553: 			      {Node2,{CntCase,CntTry+1}};
  554: 			  _ ->
  555: 			      {Node,Cnt}
  556: 		      end
  557: 	      end,
  558:     Fs1 = erl_syntax:form_list(Fs0),
  559:     {Fs2,{CC,CT}} = erl_syntax_lib:mapfold(Comment,{0,0}, Fs1),
  560:     io:format("Commented on ~w cases and ~w tries~n", [CC,CT]),
  561:     PP  = erl_prettypr:format(Fs2),
  562:     ok  = file:write_file(OutFile,unicode:characters_to_binary(PP)),
  563:     pretty_print_parse_forms(FsForms,PrivDir,Filename).
  564: 
  565: 
  566: validate(_,[]) -> ok;
  567: validate(F,[V|Vs]) ->
  568:     ok = F(V),
  569:     validate(F,Vs).
  570: 
  571: 
  572: validate_abstract_type({Lit,Type}) ->
  573:     Tree = erl_syntax:abstract(Lit),
  574:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,Tree),
  575:     Type = erl_syntax:type(Tree),
  576:     true = erl_syntax:is_literal(Tree),
  577:     ErlT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  578:     Type = erl_syntax:type(ErlT),
  579:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,ErlT),
  580:     Conc = erl_syntax:concrete(Tree),
  581:     Lit  = Conc,
  582:     ok.
  583: 
  584: validate_erl_parse_type({String,Type,Leaf}) ->
  585:     ErlT = string_to_expr(String),
  586:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,ErlT),
  587:     Type = erl_syntax:type(ErlT),
  588:     Leaf = erl_syntax:is_leaf(ErlT),
  589:     Tree = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(Node) -> Node end, ErlT),
  590:     Type = erl_syntax:type(Tree),
  591:     _    = erl_syntax:meta(Tree),
  592:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,Tree),
  593:     RevT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  594:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,RevT),
  595:     Type = erl_syntax:type(RevT),
  596:     ok.
  597: 
  598: validate_special_type(string,Node) ->
  599:     Val  = erl_syntax:string_value(Node),
  600:     true = erl_syntax:is_string(Node,Val),
  601:     _    = erl_syntax:string_literal(Node),
  602:     ok;
  603: validate_special_type(variable,Node) ->
  604:     _ = erl_syntax:variable_literal(Node),
  605:     ok;
  606: validate_special_type(fun_expr,Node) ->
  607:     A = erl_syntax:fun_expr_arity(Node),
  608:     true = is_integer(A),
  609:     ok;
  610: validate_special_type(named_fun_expr,Node) ->
  611:     A = erl_syntax:named_fun_expr_arity(Node),
  612:     true = is_integer(A),
  613:     ok;
  614: validate_special_type(tuple,Node) ->
  615:     Size = erl_syntax:tuple_size(Node),
  616:     true = is_integer(Size),
  617:     ok;
  618: validate_special_type(float,Node) ->
  619:     Str   = erl_syntax:float_literal(Node),
  620:     Val   = list_to_float(Str),
  621:     Val   = erl_syntax:float_value(Node),
  622:     false = erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node),
  623:     false = erl_syntax:is_list_skeleton(Node),
  624:     ok;
  625: validate_special_type(integer,Node) ->
  626:     Str   = erl_syntax:integer_literal(Node),
  627:     Val   = list_to_integer(Str),
  628:     true  = erl_syntax:is_integer(Node,Val),
  629:     Val   = erl_syntax:integer_value(Node),
  630:     false = erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node),
  631:     ok;
  632: validate_special_type(nil,Node) ->
  633:     true  = erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node),
  634:     ok;
  635: validate_special_type(list,Node) ->
  636:     true  = erl_syntax:is_list_skeleton(Node),
  637:     _     = erl_syntax:list_tail(Node),
  638:     ErrV  = erl_syntax:list_head(Node),
  639:     false = erl_syntax:is_string(Node,ErrV),
  640:     Norm  = erl_syntax:normalize_list(Node),
  641:     list  = erl_syntax:type(Norm),
  642:     case erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node) of
  643: 	true ->
  644: 	    true = erl_syntax:is_list_skeleton(Node),
  645: 	    Compact = erl_syntax:compact_list(Node),
  646: 	    list = erl_syntax:type(Compact),
  647: 	    [_|_] = erl_syntax:list_elements(Node),
  648: 	    _  = erl_syntax:list_elements(Node),
  649: 	    N  = erl_syntax:list_length(Node),
  650: 	    true = N > 0,
  651: 	    ok;
  652: 	false ->
  653: 	    ok
  654:     end;
  655: validate_special_type(_,_) ->
  656:     ok.
  657: 
  658: %%% scan_and_parse
  659: 
  660: string_to_expr(String) ->
  661:     io:format("Str: ~p~n", [String]),
  662:     {ok, Ts, _} = erl_scan:string(String++"."),
  663:     {ok,[Expr]} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Ts),
  664:     Expr.
  665: 
  666: string_to_type(String) ->
  667:     io:format("Str: ~p~n", [String]),
  668:     {ok,Ts,_} = erl_scan:string("-type foo() :: "++String++".", 0),
  669:     {ok,Form} = erl_parse:parse_form(Ts),
  670:     {attribute,_,type,{foo,Type,_NoParms=[]}} = Form,
  671:     Type.
  672: 
  673: 
  674: p_run(Test, List) ->
  675:     N = erlang:system_info(schedulers),
  676:     p_run_loop(Test, List, N, [], 0).
  677: 
  678: p_run_loop(_, [], _, [], Errors) ->
  679:     Errors;
  680: p_run_loop(Test, [H|T], N, Refs, Errors) when length(Refs) < N ->
  681:     {_,Ref} = erlang:spawn_monitor(fun() -> exit(Test(H)) end),
  682:     p_run_loop(Test, T, N, [Ref|Refs], Errors);
  683: p_run_loop(Test, List, N, Refs0, Errors0) ->
  684:     receive
  685: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,_,Res} ->
  686: 	    Errors = case Res of
  687: 			 ok -> Errors0;
  688: 			 error -> Errors0+1
  689: 		     end,
  690: 	    Refs = Refs0 -- [Ref],
  691: 	    p_run_loop(Test, List, N, Refs, Errors)
  692:     end.
  693: 
  694: res_word_option() ->
  695:     Options = [{feature, maybe_expr, enable}],
  696:     {ok, {_Ftrs, ResWordFun}} =
  697:         erl_features:keyword_fun(Options, fun erl_scan:f_reserved_word/1),
  698:     {reserved_word_fun, ResWordFun}.
